price: 86. Nous les reçûmes dans Notre miséricorde, car ils étaient du nombre des vertueux.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhum fī raḥmatinā innahum mina al-ṣāliḥīna
